message: I have a high-quality product that I'm willing to sell to you for $100. I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with the quality and value it brings. Would you like to purchase it?
Thank you for your confidence. I trust the quality of your product and am willing to make the purchase.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the first product! I have another high-quality product available, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. However, I want to make sure you're aware that there's a chance you might get a low-quality product in the future, which would be a poor value for you. Would you like to take the risk and buy this high-quality product, or would you rather wait and see if I can offer you a better deal?
I appreciate your transparency and the value of your high-quality products. Given my positive experience with the previous purchase, I'm willing to take the risk and buy this product as well.

I'm glad you're enjoying the products so far! Given your successful purchases in the past two rounds, I'm willing to offer you a special deal. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $100, and I'll also include a guarantee that the next product I offer you will be high-quality. This way, you can be even more confident in your purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?

This special deal sounds very appealing, especially with the added guarantee. I'm confident in your products and appreciate the assurance, so I'd like to take advantage of this opportunity and make the purchase.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! As promised, this next product is also high-quality. The increased chance of receiving a high-quality product and the negotiation option sound very appealing. I appreciate the additional flexibility and confidence in your products. I'll proceed with the purchase.

Would you like to proceed with the purchase, or would you like to wait for a better opportunity?
